feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: W 33 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
